nodes.text: Spiders, also known as arachnids, were an eight-legged species found throughout the galaxy. Ginntho, spine spiders, assassin-spiders, and spice spiders were all members of this species. The Harch, krykna, and Rakazzak beasts were considered to be "spider-like." Despite being named after this creature, none of the droids known as spider droids ever had eight legs.
